sentences.en: An interruption put it quite out of my head.
sentences.cn: 一打岔我就把这事全忘了.

sentences.en: An occurrence, external to an operation, that could cause an interruption of the operation.
sentences.cn: 能引起操作中断的操作以外的事件.

sentences.en: Annoyed at the interruption, Nim picked up the telephone and answered curtly , " Yes? "
sentences.cn: 尼姆为被打扰而感到生气.他抓起电话,没好气地应了声: “ 什么事? ”

sentences.en: Chinese civilization is the only one without interruption in the world.
sentences.cn: 中华文明是人类历史上唯一没有中断的文明。

sentences.en: Chinese civilization is the only one without interruption.
sentences.cn: 中华文明是唯一没有中断的文明。

sentences.en: Constant interruption of his work exasperated him.
sentences.cn: 对他工作不断的干扰使他恼怒.

sentences.en: For tasks that execute code in a loop, it is common to check for interruption only once per loop iteration.
sentences.cn: 对于执行一个循环中的代码的任务，通常只需为每一个循环迭代检查一次中断。

sentences.en: He had played only a few hands with moderate luck when there was an interruption.
sentences.cn: 他今天的手气平平,没想到才打了几副牌就来了打搅.

sentences.en: He ignored her interruptions.
sentences.cn: 他没有理会她的打岔。

sentences.en: I was able to get on with my work without interruption.
sentences.cn: 我可以不受打扰继续我的工作了。

sentences.en: I was debarrassed of interruption; my half - effaced thought instantly revived.
sentences.cn: 我摆脱了干扰; 我的一半已被磨灭的思想立即活跃起来.

sentences.en: LabVIEW introduced under the activex control methods and data transmission interruption skills.
sentences.cn: 介绍了LabVIEW下的activex控件的中断方法和数据传递技巧.

sentences.en: Never mind the interruption; proceed with your story.
sentences.cn: 不要理睬别人的插话, 继续讲你的故事.

sentences.en: She has kept up physical training for several years without interruption.
sentences.cn: 她坚持锻炼,多年来从未间断.

sentences.en: So, any interruption to one of the access path does not affect storage access from the host.
sentences.cn: 因此，其中一条访问路径的中断不会影响从主机发起的存储访问。

sentences.en: The birth of her son was a minor interruption to her career.
sentences.cn: 她儿子的出生对她的事业造成一个小小的中断。

sentences.en: The men were ordered to keep watch against interruption.
sentences.cn: 跟班们奉命担任警戒,以防发生打岔的事.

sentences.en: The moment there was interruption of access itself, we must act.
sentences.cn: 一旦出入权本身受到阻碍, 我们就必须采取行动.

sentences.en: There was constant jeering and interruption from the floor.
sentences.cn: 议员席上不断有人在嘲讽和打岔.

sentences.en: This interruption is very annoying.
sentences.cn: 这样打岔令人讨厌。

sentences.en: We have always been able to supply these firms with their monthly requirements without interruption.
sentences.cn: 我方始终能供应这些公司每月所需的数量,从无间断.

words.tran_cn: 中断的；被打断的；不规则的

phrases.tran_cn: 供电中断，电源中断；从电中断

trans.tran_cn: 中断，打断，障碍物，打岔的事
trans.tran_en: something that temporarily stops an activity or a situation; a time when an activity is stopped
